data.title: A list of Over 6,300 Black Authors Profiled on the African American Literature Book Club
data.meta_description: Biographies, published books and more information for over 6,300 African American, and authors of African descent from the Caribbean, Europe and the Americas.  The largest list of Black writers ever compiled!
data.meta_site_name: Author’s Homepage for the African American Literature Book Club
data.text:
List of 6,634 Authors Profiled on AALBC.com

You’re viewing the largest, curated, list of Black writers ever compiled! Here you can learn more about African American writers, writers from Africa and the entire African Diaspora.

Authors: Get Your Own Author Profile on AALBC Now.

You may also share your work with readers on our discussion forums. Watch this short video to learn how, or just dive right in and start a conversation; it is pretty easy.
